authors: Jade Watkins For Daily Mail Australia
description: The stunning 42-year-old was seen wearing the same black lingerie-inspired dress she wore for her promotional duties earlier in the day as she strutted through Sydney International airport.
title: Heidi Klum struts through the airport in lingerie-inspired dress
title_page: Heidi Klum struts through the airport in lingerie-inspired dress | Daily Mail Online
text:
She had had a very busy day promoting her lingerie line in Sydney on Thursday.
And as Heidi Klum jetted out of Australia that afternoon it appears the supermodel had no time to change before boarding her flight.
The stunning 42-year-old was seen wearing the same black lingerie-inspired dress she wore for her promotional duties earlier in the day as she strutted through Sydney International Airport.
Scroll down for video
Heading home: Heidi Klum left Sydney, Australia on Thursday evening, wearing the same lace dress she wore for an in-store appearance earlier in the day
Smiling for the cameras, the five foot nine supermodel was still glowing after an entire day of work.
She once again wrapped her favourite grey cashmere shawl around her shoulders and covered her eyes with a pair of aviator sunglasses.
It wasn't too long before she had boarded her international flight, and posting a picture of herself on the plane wearing some cosy camouflage tracksuit pants that matched her camo-printed Hermes Birkin bag.
Sitting in what appeared to be first class, with her feet up, she wrote in the Instagram caption: 'Thank you Australia for your warm welcome! Had the best time ... until next time.'
Just before her airport arrival, Heidi made an in-store appearance surrounded by hunky and shirtless male models.
The German beauty was at David Jones to promote her HK Man range, stunning in her black lace dress.
The leggy star showed off her thin frame in her outfit, which featured spaghetti straps and a thigh-split with lace panel.
Leggy: The 42-year-old strutted around the airport in her sky-high heels
Glowing: The German model didn't have a hair out of place as she prepared to board her flight
Lace was also featured at the back of the dress and just over her bust.
She accessorised her look with black buckled heels and a multi-layered necklace and a ring.
Heidi, who has modeled for the likes of Victoria's Secret, kept her locks out and over her shoulders.
Cosy: Once she had boarded her flight she changed into some cosy camouflage tracksuit pants
Looking fresh, her make-up was kept simple to show off her model good looks.
Heidi appeared to be in high spirits for her day of promotional duties and was beaming widely as she appeared in front of crowds at the department store.
Australian star and TV presenter Tom Williams was the MC at the appearance, and he graced the stage with Heidi.
Hunks in trunks: Just before her airport arrival, Heidi made an in-store appearance surrounded by hunky and shirtless male models
On the day, the first 20 customers in-store received a signed Heidi Klum Intimate gift pack for men and had the opportunity to get their photo taken with Heidi.
She also has a line for women, Heidi Klum Intimates, that she has been busy promoting while in Australia.
Heidi was also seen handing out ice cream to fans from a truck covered in branding for Heidi Klum Intimates and David Jones.
